original_text: for you have not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance that the Lord your God is giving you.
korean_text: 너희가 너희 하나님 여호와께서 주시는 안식과 기업에 아직은 이르지 못하였거니와

sentences.original_text: for you have not as yet come to the rest
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 아직 안식에 이르지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God is giving you
